description: Abstract model for all resource property models (person, equipment, physical asset, material definition, material lot, material sublot, work master, process segment, operation definition, operational location, operations segment, test specification, test result)

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the resource property.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
